name: Morning Mushrooms
description:
Morning Mushrooms is a Flatgame about my experience wandering the woods in the morning looking for mushrooms before anyone else woke up.  If you aren't familiar with Flatgames they are simple 2D games that are about breaking games down to their raw essentials. Think of it as a collage you can explore!

Move around using the arrow keys or WASD. Explore the forest and take time to reflect. Having a cup of tea at the same time is optional but highly suggested.

Environment animation script is from here and music is by Thomas Hickman.  Everything else was created by me.

Morning Mushrooms was originally started for FLATJAM2017 but due to general life busyness and computer issues it was finished months later.
